name: Component includes only page and never subpage (SBP) or secondary-page (PeopleSoft)
description: This quality rule reports Component including a page but never subpage (SBP) or secondary page.
rationale:
A Component represents a complete business transaction. It comprises either a single page or a set of pages that is meant to be processed as one page.
For a reason of maintainability, it is recommended to include subpage and secondary pages in the same component as their parent Page.
remediation: Include subpage and secondary pages in the same component as their parent Page.
alternativeName: Component includes only page and never subpage (SBP) or secondary-page (PeopleSoft)
